name: Light&Darkness
description:
Basically in this game there are the first 2/3 chapters of a much greater jrpg inspired by (and closely resembling) the old final fantasy games.
I was very young when I started working on this game (around 15 years old) and I kept on working on it from time to time.
This is one of the first game I've ever made and that actually made me wish to become a game developer. Without the need of any programming skill I was able to write an interactive story and create levels.
Basically it helped me taking the first steps into storytelling and level design, while usign the art and the code provided by the tool (RPGMaker XP).
